#summary Jabber Tools README

= Usage =

jabber-tool-roster-dump <JID> <password> [<host> <port>]

jabber-tool-roster-import <JID> <password> [<host> <port>]

= Examples =

jabber-tool-roster-dump user@domain1.org 123456 | sed 's#domain1.org#domain2.org#' | jabber-tool-roster-import user@domain2.org 654321
